content: floretta mittens are designed with the same pattern on the front and the palm so there is no designated left or right the floral pattern is also on the thumb these are knitted with 2 colors at a time even though there are lots of color changes as you knit the main color background color is the same throughout if you are choosing your own colors consider 2 shades of green for the stems/leaves and 3 bright colors for the flowers all yarns are knit pick palette 100% wool fingering weight coriander heather mc 108 yds autumn heather 25 yds forest heather 25yds verdant heather 30 yds lingonberry heather 15 yds salsa heather 11 yds one size adult medium
